instructions: This sheet is designed for use with the Returner's Final Fantasy RPG 3rd Edition. The original version of this sheet was designed by John Myles (Actoba on Roll20.net) for DnD_5e. It has been extensively modified and will continue to be updated as necessary. Optional rules for Map Combat and Limit Breaks are fully supported. Sheet help is available on roll20.net from Kiyomi N.
